I like to play baseball.
I am a doctor.

participant_2.background:
I like chicken nuggets.
I love animals.
I love reading.
My favorite band is a fine frenzy.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love reading, listening to music, and hanging out with my friends.
What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is Fine Frenzy.
I've never heard of them. What kind of music do they play?
They're a pop rock band, and they have a really unique sound. I love their lyrics and their melodies.
I'll have to check them out. Do you have any other hobbies?
I love animals, so I volunteer at my local animal shelter. I also love to cook, and I'm always trying new recipes.
That's awesome! I love to cook too. What are some of your favorite dishes to make?
I love to make anything with chicken, and I'm a big fan of comfort food.
I love chicken nuggets! What are some of your favorite comfort foods?
I love mashed potatoes, macaroni and cheese, and lasagna.
Those are all great comfort foods! I love them all.
Me too! I also love to bake, so I'll often make cookies or cupcakes for my friends and family.
That's so kind of you! I'm sure they love it.
They do! I love to make people happy.
